(Okay, can your scanners even pick up something like that? You never 
even gave Soundwave a chance to defend the driver. It's already been 
agreed upon that you were moding. Sorry, but you don't have the 
driver and you are not a TM3.)

Vulois smiles back at Hell Beast.

"No need, boss. The driver is on it's way here right now."
